name: MichaelBernstein.net
tagline: A disambiguation site (and informal network) for various 'Michael Bernsteins' on the net.
body:
## Michael Ron Bernstein
* Lives in Albuquerque, NM
* [Python](http://python.org) web developer
* Designer of the [PyCon logo](http://pycon.org)
* Author of the [Zope Bible](http://www.amazon.com/Zope-Bible-Michael-Bernstein/dp/0764548573)
* American/Israeli dual national
* 2011 [Code for America](http://codeforamerica.org) Fellow
* [webmaven](https://github.com/webmaven) on Github
* [@nerdworldorder](https://twitter.com/nerdwordorder) on Twitter
* [LinkedIn profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelbernstein)
* [Personal website](http://www.michaelbernstein.com)

## @mrb info goes here
* [@mrb_bk](https://twitter.com/mrb_bk) on Twitter

## @mbernst info goes here

## @michaelbernstein info goes here
